

game_numbers_to_info <- function(game_numbers) {
  enframe(game_numbers, name = NULL, value = "game") %>% 
    rowwise() %>% 
    mutate(info = list(game_number_to_info(game))) %>% 
    unnest_wider(info)
}

```{r}

length(game_ids)
```

```{r}

display_games() %>% arrange(desc(retrieved)) %>% View("games")
```

find lower and upper limit of this league


```{r}
this_game <- 3549720
game_limits <- league_limits(this_game)
game_limits
```

```{r}
get_league(this_game)
display_games() %>% 
  filter(between(game, game_limits[1], game_limits[2])) %>% 
  arrange(game) %>% 
  View("these games")
```
